item.title: Identifying Docker container outage using Prometheus
item.description: Prometheus is a an open-source monitoring system with a dimensional data model, flexible query language, efficient time series database and modern alerting approach. Metric data is pulled (on a regular time-interval) from so called exporters which expose the metrics coming from applications/operating systems etc.. +------------------+ +----------+ Visualize data | +------------+ | | Grafana +---> coming from | | Dockerized | | +----+-----+ Prometheus | | Application| | | | +------------+ | ^ | +------------+ | Pull data +----------+ | | | CAdvisor +--------->-------+Prometheus+----------+ | +------------+ | +---------++ | | | | Operating System | | | with | | | Docker installed | | | | v +------------------+ Prometheus collects data coming from remote systems In the diagram above cAdvisor is a so called exporter.
